name: Slime Adventure (itch) (DalasKingora)
description:
You play as a little slime who wishes to reach the surface to see the sun. But the caves are old and legends speak of a being guarding the exit. Find the treasures to get your way through!

This is my first ever game made in school so its is far from perfect but I had fun learning how to make this game! Hope you enjoy! Any feedback is apricated!

Note: Everything but the music and sound was made by me. The music and sounds are free assets I used. I'm not that good... YET!
